text: Bloomfield Cricket and Athletic Club, based in Colombo, has been active since 1892. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Major League Tournament which they have won ten times (including once shared), most recently in 2024â€“25. Their home ground is the BCAC Ground in the Cinnamon Gardens district of Colombo. ==References== Category:First-class cricket teams in Sri Lanka Category:1892 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Bloomfield Cricket and Athletic Club
